title: Energy Saving
description: Turn off lights when not in use to save electricity.

title: Water Conservation
description: Use water-efficient appliances and take shorter showers.

title: Plastic Reduction
description: Avoid single-use plastics and opt for reusable items.

title: Eco-Friendly Transportation
description: Use public transport, bike, or walk instead of driving.

title: Sustainable Shopping
description: Support brands that prioritize sustainability and ethical production.
